actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Internal Revenue Code, an exclusion from gross income of up to $500 for the interest on deposits in savings institutions chartered under Federal law, and banks and credit unions the deposits or accounts in which are chartered under State law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.
